articles.title: Google Chrome has a useful new trick to keep tabs on your browsing - Express
articles.description: CHROME users can enjoy a nifty new feature designed to make it easier to keep your track of everything in your tabs. First previewed a week ago, unbelievably, the feature is already rolling out to web browser users worldwide right now.
